cast.original_title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
cast.overview: While the Civil War rages on between the Union and the Confederacy, three men – a quiet loner, a ruthless hitman, and a Mexican bandit – comb the American Southwest in search of a strongbox containing $200,000 in stolen gold.
cast.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

cast.overview: The Man With No Name enters the Mexican village of San Miguel in the midst of a power struggle among the three Rojo brothers and sheriff John Baxter. When a regiment of Mexican soldiers bearing gold intended to pay for new weapons is waylaid by the Rojo brothers, the stranger inserts himself into the middle of the long-simmering battle, selling false information to both sides for his own benefit.
cast.title: A Fistful of Dollars

cast.overview: At the beginning of the 1913 Mexican Revolution, greedy bandit Juan Miranda and idealist John H. Mallory, an Irish Republican Army explosives expert on the lam from the British, fall in with a band of revolutionaries plotting to strike a national bank. When it turns out that the government has been using the bank as a hiding place for illegally detained political prisoners -- who are freed by the blast -- Miranda becomes a revolutionary hero against his will.
cast.title: Duck, You Sucker

cast.overview: Two bounty hunters both pursue the brutal and sadistic bandit, El Indio, who has a large bounty on his head.
cast.title: For a Few Dollars More
cast.character: Paco, Member of Indio's Gang (as José Montoya)
